title: Welcome, my dear, to Belfry House
description: Bats in the BelfryThe staircase was narrow and they had to go up single file, Cheryl stumbled and he reached back to steady her. At the top was another door.He turned to knob. The door creaked as it opened. He played his light inside, along the walls, and stepped back involuntarily. Bats. Hundreds of them hanging upside down from the walls, the ceiling. They stirred in the light, moved their wings, emitted little squeaks. One came from the ceiling, began to soar closer and closer, then came another and another. /> Cheryl gave a single shrill scream that split the darkness...
author: Stanton Forbes
